name: Portfolio_Dana_Orange_Medallion_Arm_Chair_
description:
The Portfolio Dana chair is covered in a contemporary orange and cream medallion fabric.  The transitional styled chair features rounded arms, ultimate comfort and easy assembly.
Part of the Portfolio Furniture CollectionIdeal for small space livingAttached box seat cushionNo tools locking system for easy assembly - just click and slide togetherDark espresso all wood legs for design and strengthOur efficient product and package design allows us to use less fossil fuel throughout the entire supply chain than standard, set-up furniture usesMaterials: Polyester blend fabric, HardwoodFinish: Dark espressoUpholstery color: Orange and cream medallionUpholstery fill: Plush foam, fiber and independently wrapped pocket coil spring systemSeat dimensions: 19.5 inches high x 22 inches wide x 20 inches deep sofaChair dimensions: 35.5 inches high x 34 inches wide x 31 inches deepArm height: 25 inches highStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyester BlendChair TypeAccent Chairs, Arm Chairs, Club ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorCream, OrangeFurniture PatternMedallion
